edu.ucsf.groups.model
Interface GroupAbstractionModel

public interface GroupAbstractionModel

An interface for classes that handle the model associated with presentation of grouped nodes.

Method Summary
 void addEdgeNotify(CyNetwork network, CyEdge edge)
          Inform the group model abstraction that an edge has been added.
 void addNodeNotify(CyNetwork network, CyNode node)
          Inform the group model abstraction that a node has been deleted.
 void createGroup(CyNetwork network, CyNode group_node)
          This method is called from the GroupUtils API upon creation of a new group to allow the group abstraction implementation to perform any initialization required.
 void deleteEdgeNotify(CyNetwork network, CyEdge edge)
          Inform the group model abstraction that an edge has been deleted.
 String getGroupAbstractionName()
          Return the "name" of this abstraction.
 GroupAbstractionViewer getGroupViewer()
          Get the GroupViewer for this group.
 void regroupGroup(CyNetwork network, CyNode group_node)
          This method is called from the GroupUtils API to actually present the group in a 'grouped' state.
 void removeGroup(CyNetwork network, CyNode group_node)
          This method is called from the GroupUtils API upon deletion of a new group to allow the group abstraction implementation to perform any updates in internal data structures.
 void setGroupViewer(GroupAbstractionViewer viewer)
          Set the GroupViewer for this group.
 void ungroupGroup(CyNetwork network, CyNode group_node)
          This method is called from the GroupUtils API to actually present the group in an 'ungrouped' state.
 

Method Detail

getGroupAbstractionName

String getGroupAbstractionName()
Return the "name" of this abstraction. This will be stored as part of the group.

Returns:
a String with the name of the abstraction

setGroupViewer

void setGroupViewer(GroupAbstractionViewer viewer)
Set the GroupViewer for this group. This is linked to the abstraction since not all viewers will work with all abstractions. Note that each abstraction should provide (or utilize an existing) default viewer.

Parameters:
viewer - the GroupViewer to use

getGroupViewer

GroupAbstractionViewer getGroupViewer()
Get the GroupViewer for this group.

Returns:
the GroupViewer currently set

createGroup

void createGroup(CyNetwork network,
                 CyNode group_node)
This method is called from the GroupUtils API upon creation of a new group to allow the group abstraction implementation to perform any initialization required. This is called after the GroupUtils API has completed all of its initialization.

Parameters:
network - the CyNetwork that will contain the resulting group node
group_node - the CyNode that represents the group

removeGroup

void removeGroup(CyNetwork network,
                 CyNode group_node)
This method is called from the GroupUtils API upon deletion of a new group to allow the group abstraction implementation to perform any updates in internal data structures. This is called before the GroupUtils API performs any updates, including the actual deletion of the node and its associated attributes.

Parameters:
network - the CyNetwork that will contain the resulting group node
group_node - the CyNode that represents the group

regroupGroup

void regroupGroup(CyNetwork network,
                  CyNode group_node)
This method is called from the GroupUtils API to actually present the group in a 'grouped' state.

Parameters:
network - the CyNetwork that will contain the resulting group node
group_node - the CyNode that represents the group

ungroupGroup

void ungroupGroup(CyNetwork network,
                  CyNode group_node)
This method is called from the GroupUtils API to actually present the group in an 'ungrouped' state.

Parameters:
network - the CyNetwork that will contain the resulting group node
group_node - the CyNode that represents the group

addEdgeNotify

void addEdgeNotify(CyNetwork network,
                   CyEdge edge)
Inform the group model abstraction that an edge has been added. This can be an empty function if this abstraction has no need to track specific edge information.

Parameters:
network - the CyNetwork containing the groups.
edge - the CyEdge that has been added.

deleteEdgeNotify

void deleteEdgeNotify(CyNetwork network,
                      CyEdge edge)
Inform the group model abstraction that an edge has been deleted. This can be an empty function if this abstraction has no need to track specific edge information.

Parameters:
network - the CyNetwork containing the groups.
edge - the CyEdge that has been deleted.

addNodeNotify

void addNodeNotify(CyNetwork network,
                   CyNode node)
Inform the group model abstraction that a node has been deleted. This can be an empty function if this abstraction has no need to track specific node information.

Parameters:
network - the CyNetwork containing the groups.
node - the CyNode that has been deleted.
